Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: Joe tries to prove that Allison's dreams are stress related by sending descriptions of them to law enforcement agencies. However, when one of her dreams matches a homicide in Texas, his attempt is thwarted.
Episodes.GuestStars: Rachel Miner, Lawrence Pressman, Arliss Howard, April Grace, Matt Barr, Jamil Z. Smith, Bruce Nozick, Randy Mulkey, Joe Stevens, Terry Woodberry, John Paxton, Scott Rabinowitz, Ken Kerman, Jamie Litton, Danny Rome

Episodes.Title: Suspicions and Certainties
Episodes.Plot: Allison questions her powers when her old boss asks for her help in selecting a jury that will reinstate the death penalty for a murderer/rapist.  This causes Allison to suspect that she has helped put the wrong man on death row.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bruce Gray, Alan Woolf, Sofia Karstens, Howard S. Miller, Rebecca Metz, Bruno Gioiello, John Eddins, Derk Cheetwood, Anna Maganini, Andrew Heald, BW Gonzalez, Reed Frerichs, Bruno Oliver, John Mese, Elizabeth Lack

Episodes.Title: A Couple of Choices
Episodes.Plot: Allison has a dream of a husband and wife committing a murder/suicide. D.A. Devalos introduces her to a friend of his, Detective Lee Scanlon, who's sister and brother in-law's deaths were also ruled a murder/suicide, and sees a connection.  After learning about Allison's methods of investigation, Scanlon decides he doesn't want her help.
Episodes.GuestStars: Silas Weir Mitchell, Donna Bullock, Jon Sklaroff, Paul Schackman, Sam Vance, Neal Matarazzo, Brandon Keener, Phe Caplan, Pia Artesona, Seth Walker

Episodes.Title: Night of the Wolf
Episodes.Plot: Allison tries convincing Devalos that she heard a witness misinforming a police sketch artist, making them look for the wrong man. Meanwhile, 6-year-old Bridgette's new playmate indicates that another member of the family can see the dead.
Episodes.GuestStars: Anahi Bustillos, Brent Jennings, Elizabeth Penn Payne, Wayne King, Hunter Brochu, Lily Jackson, Saida Pagan, David Trice, Nicole Pano

Episodes.Title: In Sickness and Adultery
Episodes.Plot: Allison seeks Catherine's (the psychic she talked to in "Pilot") help after learning that Joe has scheduled a biopsy exam. The psychic gives her a strange message that later comes back to haunt Allison.  A case about the homicide of a police officer takes a shocking turn when Allison dreams where the murder weapon is located and is then called to the stand to testify how she obtained the information. Meanwhile, Allison fears that Joe is having an affair when he repeatedly comes home late from wo
Episodes.GuestStars: Tiger Mendez, Seth T. Walker, Margo Martindale, John Wesley, Robert Blanche, Lily Rains, Catherine Wadkins, Annabelle Milne, Maria Quiban, Obie Sims, Barbra Bolle

Episodes.Title: Coming Soon
Episodes.Plot: Allison runs into the man who kidnapped her daughter in one of her dreams at the District Attorney's office. She learns that he is a "Good Samaritan" who witnessed a robbery and is fully cooperating. After learning that he has kidnapped multiple young women, Allison reaches a roadblock in her investigation that leads her to yet another unbelievable breakthrough in the case.  Meanwhile, Joe tutors Ariel in math, which in turn brings Allison to another shocking discovery.
Episodes.GuestStars: Wendi Bromley, Khrystyne Haje, Reed Diamond, Camryn Grimes, Vince Duvall, Rachel Kimsey, Caroline Marcelle

Episodes.Title: Jump Start
Episodes.Plot: Allison investigates the supposed suicide of a girl who was dating D.A. Larry Watt's son Greg. When the girl's body is found in a ravine, new evidence is presented that implicates the defense attorney. Meanwhile, Joe is concerned about one of his colleagues after Allison has a premonition of the colleague having a heart attack.
Episodes.GuestStars: Thomas Ian Nicholas, Joey Slotnick, Begona Plaza, Ariana Thomas, Jeffrey Housepian, Kurt Strommer, Gus Lynch, Alex Breckenridge, Scott Klace

Episodes.Title: Lucky
Episodes.Plot: After Alison has a terrible dream of her soldier brother dying, she gets a surprise at her front door. Meanwhile, Allison and Devalos work on an arson case and Allison has trouble getting information from the ghost of a young girl who died in the fire.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ryan Hurst, Jay Ferguson, Colby French, Susan Beaubian, Blaine Saunders, Ingrid Coree

Episodes.Title: Coded
Episodes.Plot: Allison's daughter Ariel dreams that she is a young girl named Sarah being held captive by an ogre in a castle. While Joe agonizes over the possibility that both of his daughters have inherited their mother's psychic abilities, Allison tries to help Ariel and interpret the dream. However, Allison's advice provokes Ariel to run away from a field trip in order to follow up a clue.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jennette McCurdy, Don Harvey, Joe Chrest, Maura Soden, Jake Dinwiddie, Nelson Mashita

Episodes.Title: The Other Side of the Tracks
Episodes.Plot: Allison's recurring dream about two young boys racing a train is analyzed by Dr. Leonard Cardwell, but Allison soon learns that he's involved. Devalos investigates the case of a 14-year-old who confessed to murder.
Episodes.GuestStars: Seth T. Walker, Zach Grenier, Elizabeth Lackey, Wallace Langham, Michael Mantell, Grace Zabriskie, Victor Talmadge, Samuel Monterroza, Caryn West, Jonathan Chase, Romeo Fabian, Nick Price, Nathan Price, Andrew Ge

Episodes.Title: I Married a Mind Reader
Episodes.Plot: Allison gets sick and entertains herself by watching a '60s sitcom called "I Married a Mind Reader." The male star was convicted of killing his wife, the female star. Allison's dreams take her back to the '60s, which for her end up being a time of deceit, lies, and secrets.
Episodes.GuestStars: Frances Fisher, Neil Vipond, Phil Abrams, Kerry Leigh Michaels, Christopher Michael, Janet Rotblatt, Paul Blackthorne

Episodes.Title: A Priest, a Doctor and a Medium Walk into an Execution Chamber
Episodes.Plot: The girlfriend of a convicted drug lord is killed on the night of his execution. The drug lord's ghost is seen at the crime scene, and Allison is brought in to investigate.  Also, Allison discovers a dark secret about the mother of a boy that Ariel has a crush on.
Episodes.GuestStars: Seth T. Walker, Tiger Mendez, Blake Robbins, Gino Montesinos, Jaimé P. Gomez, Faline England, Dane Northcutt, Roberto Montesinos, Hector Atreyu Ruiz, Craig Gellis, Diane Gaidry, Adria Dawn, Morann Peri, Jordan Ga

Episodes.Title: Being Mrs. O'Leary's Cow
Episodes.Plot: Evidence shows that a pilot is indeed guilty of his wife's murder. However, in Allison?s dream, when the pilot is put in jail, there is a plane crash where hundreds of people are killed. Should Allison put forth the evidence to land this guilty man in jail, or let him go free in order to save hundreds of innocent lives?
Episodes.GuestStars: Chad Lowe, Fay Masterson, Robert Patrick Benedict, Neil Schwary, Michael Crider, Elliott Grey, John Hartmann, Patrick Robert Smith

Episodes.Title: In the Rough
Episodes.Plot: When a case from ten years is re-opened, Allison finds herself in a chaotic situation. Things continue to get messier when Allison finds out that the convicted man is innocent, and that someone she knows and trusts may have been involved in his framing.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kathy Baker, Bruce Gray, Paul Adelstein, Dean Norris, Samantha Quan, Evan Parke, Paul Norwood, Mary Strong, John Eric Montana, Daniel von Lennep, Todd Malta

Episodes.Title: Penny for Your Thoughts
Episodes.Plot: Allison encounters a psychopathic doctor who raped and murdered numerous teenage girls years ago. After learning that an evil soul has been possessing people, she sets forth to stop it before a new victim is found. Meanwhile, Ariel's math teacher accuses her of cheating and Joe steps up to her defense.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cas Anvar, Andy Milder, Michele Harrell, Brent Jennings, Roz Witt, Sumalee Montano, Mark A. Sheppard, Lenora May, Robert Joy, Kay Panabaker

Episodes.Title: When Push Comes to Shove (1)
Episodes.Plot: After somehow seeing Capt. Kenneth Push in a vision at a murder scene, Allison calls upon his assistance to find a serial killer. However, the only way Capt. Push can help is by literally putting his life on the line.
Episodes.GuestStars: Joel Kramer,  Zoe Simpson, Kelly McNair, Randy Mulkey, Christopher Hoffman, Saida Pagan, Lyn Alicia Henderson, Reggie Jordan, John O'Brien, Neal Matarazzo, Phil Reeves, Arliss Howard
